amendment.description: An amendment numbered 18 printed in Part B of House Report 118-559 to reduce the salary of Samantha Power, Administrator of the United States Agency for International Development, to $1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Greene (GA) amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 133 - 277, 1 Present (Roll no. 306).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Greene (GA) amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 133 - 277, 1 Present (Roll no. 306).
